title: Essential Urological Health Tips for Men & Women | Expert Advice By Dr Vishnu Agrawal
content:
Essential Urological Health Tips for Men & Women | Expert Advice

As a urology patient in Ajmer, understanding your urinary and reproductive health is crucial. From kidney stone prevention to prostate health, here's a comprehensive guide—with insights from Dr. Vishnu Agrawal, a leading Urologist & Laparoscopic Surgeon in Ajmer.

1. Kidney Stone Prevention: Key Strategies

Kidney stones affect 1 in 10 people. Dr. Vishnu Agrawal, a top urologist in Ajmer, recommends:

  • Hydration: Drink 3+ liters of water daily to flush your system.
  • Dietary Changes: Limit salt, oxalate-rich foods (spinach, nuts), and animal protein.
  • Warning Signs: Severe flank pain or blood in urine? Consult a urology specialist in Ajmer immediately.

2. Prostate Health: What Every Man Should Know

After age 50, regular prostate checks at Agrawal Clinic are essential:

  • PSA Testing: Recommended annually for men over 50 (earlier if high-risk).
  • BPH Symptoms: Frequent urination, weak stream, or nocturia may indicate enlargement.
  • Cancer Screening: Digital exams + PSA tests detect early signs.

📌 Pro Tip: Don't ignore urinary changes—early intervention is key.

3. Urinary Tract Health for Women

UTIs affect 50% of women. Dr. Agrawal advises:

  • Prevention: Wipe front-to-back, urinate after intercourse, stay hydrated.
  • Recurrent UTIs: May require low-dose antibiotics or vaginal estrogen.
  • Pelvic Floor Exercises: Kegels prevent incontinence.

4. Recognizing Urological Emergencies

When to visit a 24/7 urology center in Ajmer:

  • Inability to urinate (acute urinary retention).
  • Severe testicular pain (possible torsion).
  • Visible blood in urine (hematuria).

5. Laparoscopic Surgery Advancements

At Agrawal Clinic, we offer minimally invasive options for:

  • Kidney Stones: PCNL/RIRS instead of open surgery.
  • Prostate Issues: Laser prostatectomy with faster recovery.
  • Urological Cancers: Precision robotic-assisted techniques.

Why Trust Dr. Vishnu Agrawal?

Ajmer's patients choose Dr. Agrawal for:

  • 🏥 Laparoscopic Expertise: 15+ years performing minimally invasive surgeries.
  • 💊 Personalized Treatment: Tailored plans for kidney stones, BPH, and cancers.
  • 📱 Discreet Consultations: Confidential care for sensitive issues.

Need Urological Care? Visit Agrawal Clinic!

For expert diagnosis of kidney stones, prostate issues, or urinary conditions, consult Dr. Vishnu Agrawal today.

📞 Call: +91 82409 70287

How to Know If You Need a Kidney Doctor

title: Best Male Infertility Treatment Doctor In Ajmer - Dr. Vishnu Agrawal
content:
Struggling with Male Infertility? Meet Dr. Vishnu Agrawal – Ajmer’s Top Specialist

If you and your partner are facing difficulties conceiving, you’re not alone. Male infertility affects 1 in 7 couples, but the good news is that Dr. Vishnu Agrawal, the best male infertility doctor in Ajmer, offers advanced treatments to help you become a father. At Agrawal Clinic, we provide compassionate care and proven solutions.

Common Causes of Male Infertility

Dr. Vishnu Agrawal, a leading urologist and infertility specialist in Ajmer, explains the key causes:

  • Low Sperm Count: Less than 15 million sperm per milliliter.
  • Poor Sperm Motility: Sperm don’t swim well.
  • Blockages: Tubes carrying sperm get blocked.
  • Hormonal Issues: Low testosterone or thyroid problems.
  • Lifestyle Factors: Smoking, stress, or obesity.

Signs You Should See a Male Infertility Doctor

Visit Dr. Vishnu Agrawal if you notice:

  • 🔍 Difficulty conceiving after 1 year of trying.
  • 🩺 Pain or swelling in the testicles.
  • 💊 Erectile dysfunction or low libido.
  • 🧪 Abnormal semen analysis (thick, watery, or discolored semen).

How Dr. Vishnu Agrawal Can Help

As the best male infertility specialist in Ajmer, Dr. Agrawal provides:

  • Semen Analysis: Checks sperm count, shape, and movement.
  • Hormone Tests: Finds imbalances affecting fertility.
  • Ultrasound Scans: Detects blockages or varicoceles (enlarged veins).
  • Advanced Treatments: Medications, surgery (like varicocele repair), or IVF support.

Prevention Tips for Better Fertility

Dr. Agrawal’s easy tips to boost sperm health:

  • 💧 Stay hydrated – Drink 3+ liters of water daily.
  • 🥦 Eat healthy – Fruits, nuts, and zinc-rich foods improve sperm.
  • 🚭 Avoid smoking/alcohol – They reduce sperm count.
  • 🏋️ Exercise regularly – But avoid excessive cycling (can harm sperm).
  • 😴 Reduce stress – High stress lowers testosterone.

Why Choose Dr. Vishnu Agrawal?

Ajmer’s trusted male infertility doctor offers:

  • 🏥 15+ Years of Experience – Proven success in fertility treatments.
  • 💊 Personalized Care – Tailored plans for each patient.
  • 🔬 Modern Testing – Accurate diagnoses with advanced tools.
  • 🤝 Discreet Consultations – Private, judgment-free care.

Take the First Step Toward Fatherhood

Don’t wait—consult Dr. Vishnu Agrawal, the best male infertility doctor in Ajmer, today!

📞 Call: +91 82409 70287

📍 Clinic: Agrawal Clinic, Ajmer

title: UTI Prevention & Treatment - Dr Vishnu Agrawal
content:
Understanding & Preventing Urinary Tract Infections (UTIs)

UTIs are common infections affecting the bladder, urethra, or kidneys. Dr. Vishnu Agrawal, a leading Urologist in Ajmer, shares essential insights on how to prevent UTIs and when to seek treatment.

What is a UTI?

A urinary tract infection occurs when bacteria enter the urinary system. Women are more prone, but men can also get UTIs, especially with prostate issues.

Common Symptoms of UTI

  • 🔥 Burning sensation during urination
  • 🚽 Frequent urge to urinate with little output
  • 🩸 Blood in urine or cloudy urine
  • 😣 Lower abdominal or back pain
  • 🤒 Fever or chills (if infection spreads to kidneys)

Causes & Risk Factors

  • 💧 Not drinking enough water
  • 🦠 Poor hygiene practices
  • 💊 Diabetes or weak immunity
  • 🏃‍♀️ Holding urine for long hours
  • 💑 Sexual activity without proper hygiene

How UTIs are Diagnosed

Dr. Agrawal diagnoses UTIs with urine tests, and for recurrent cases, may suggest ultrasound to rule out underlying problems.

Treatment Options

  • 💊 Antibiotics: For bacterial infections.
  • 💧 Increased fluid intake: Helps flush bacteria.
  • ⚠️ Follow-up tests: To ensure infection is cleared.

Prevention Tips from Dr. Vishnu Agrawal

  • 💧 Drink plenty of water: At least 3 litres daily.
  • 🚽 Do not hold urine: Empty your bladder regularly.
  • 🧻 Wipe front to back: Prevents bacterial spread in women.
  • 💑 Urinate after intercourse: Flushes out bacteria.
  • 🧼 Maintain personal hygiene: Daily cleaning is essential.

When to See Dr. Vishnu Agrawal?

If you have recurrent UTIs, blood in urine, fever, or back pain, consult Dr. Agrawal immediately for expert care.

Book Your Consultation Today!

Don’t ignore UTI symptoms. Get fast relief and proper guidance from Ajmer’s trusted urology specialist.

📞 Call: +91 82409 70287

📍 Clinic: Agrawal Clinic, Ajmer

🌐 Visit: www.drvishnuagrawal.in
